game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact from the ancient ruins
game.description: The ancient ruins located in the forest is believed to hold a lost artifact of great power. The adventurers are tasked with retrieving the artifact.

task.description: The adventurers must travel to the ancient ruins which is deep within the forest.
The artifact is believed to be placed in the central chamber of the ruin. The adventurers must find and retrieve it.
task.location: The central chamber of The Ancient Ruins

task.objective: Return the artifact to Old Sage Elrond
task.description: After obtaining the artifact, the adventurers must return it to Old Sage Elrond in the town.
